headline: Broadwind Energy, Inc. (BWEN) Reports Q2 Loss, Tops Revenue Estimates
summary: Broadwind Energy (BWEN) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -300.00% and +3.20%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
